Get facts straight. Quote me some scripture saying God commanded the first child killed AFTER the crucifixion. Mind u there is a GREAT BIG difference in old and new testament. Jesus was the ultimate sacrifice and because of that the whole """"rule book"""" changed. Going deeper still there are miles of books written in the same time the bible was edited that we know nothing of. Catacombs. The Roman Catholic church was the final judge and jury on what went into the bible. They left worlds of knowledge out of the bible. God never wrote a book. Spirituality tells me any grown man married to a six year old is inherently wrong. My heart cannot find justice in praying to a pedophile. I can believe God would send a being to earth to try to teach love. I dont believe Muhammad was on the right track.

Well is obvious none of you read the whole story. He had a guide, he did not know the area, he paid for license to hunt a lion. He went thru all the steps he was legally obligated to do. The GUIDE knew what he was doing was wrong, THE GUIDE set the bait. Mr. Palmer took the shot with BOW. He had no idea what lion that was, the GUIDE DID. Mr Palmer didn't have to come forward and say I think I killed that lion. He did so because he did everything he was supposed to be able to take that shot. Wether or not you think hunting is right is irrelevant, he did so legally. So stop the witch hunt on the man, and focus on the guide who knew the land, knew what he was doing.
